enable_sticky.label: Announcement bar pinned at the top

options__1.label: Only pin to top on desktop

options__2.label: Only pin to top on mobile

show_social_media.label: Display social media icons on desktop
show_social_media.info: You can add your social media links in 'Theme settings' > 'Social media'. Social media links won't be displayed if the announcement bar is set to 'Compact layout', 'Tiled display', or 'Automatically scroll left and right'.

notice_link_mb_text.label: Main body on mobile device
notice_link_mb_text.info: If not entered, system will display texts of PC version on mobile device

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

enable_mobile_slide.label: Turn on left-right scroll on mobile

mobile_pagination_style.label: Left-right scroll pagination style on mobile

desktop_layout.label: Image position on desktop
desktop_layout.info: Text below image by default on mobile

m_rows.label: Number of rows on mobile
m_rows.info: This takes effect when left-right scroll is turned on

slice_in_mobile.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

slice_in_pc.label: Scroll left and right to view on desktop

max_in_mobile.label: The maximum number of categories displayed on the mobile terminal

image_display_area.label: Image display area
image_display_area.info: Adjust the product map display area

options__0.label: Show title and price after clicking anchor

options__1.label: Fixed display of title and price

slice_in_pc.label: Scroll left and right to view on desktop

slice_in_mobile.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Display this button only if 'Maximum products displayed' is less than the product quantity of this collection

show_secondary_image.label: Display next product image on hover

group_header__0.label: To use this feature, create a namespace called "highlights" and a key with the name "list" for the product metafield, selecting the data type as "multi-line text". Once created, you can add values for the metafield field in specific products, and they will be displayed on the page.

enable_desktop_slider.label: Scroll left and right to view on desktop

enable_mobile_slider.label: Turn on left-right scroll to View all

button_text.label: Button text
button_text.info: Display this button only if 'Maximum products displayed' is less than the product quantity of this collection

show_secondary_image.label: Display next product image on hover

group_header__0.label: To use this feature, create a namespace called "highlights" and a key with the name "list" for the product metafield, selecting the data type as "multi-line text". Once created, you can add values for the metafield field in specific products, and they will be displayed on the page.

show_country_selector.label: Display country/region selection
show_country_selector.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

show_locale_selector.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

show_search_mobile.label: Display the search bar on mobile devices

search_menu.label: Suggested searches
search_menu.info: Once selected, this menu will appear in search bar as a suggestion when customers search for the first time

group_header__2.label: Tool bar
group_header__2.info: Toolbar will be fixed at the above of header

show_locale_selector.label: Display Language selector
show_locale_selector.info: You need to go to 'Market' > 'Language management' and add at least two languages for the selector to take effect. To add a language, go to ['Language settings'](/admin/settings/lang), and after adding is complete, go to ['Market'](/admin/settings/markets) > 'Language management' and add the language of the current market.

show_country_selector.label: Display country selector
show_country_selector.info: Add at least two markets for this to take effect. To add a country/region, go to [Market settings](/admin/settings/markets)

toolbar_social.label: Display the social media icon
toolbar_social.info: Add relevant social media links in ['Theme settings' > 'Social media'](/editor?locator=settings&category=media_social)

toolbar_menu.label: Navigation menu(toolbar)
toolbar_menu.info: Toolbar doesn't display drop-down menu, it only shows the first-level menu

toolbar_menu_mobile.label: Display the menu on mobile devices

second_menu_link_list.label: Sub-menu navigation
second_menu_link_list.info: Submenu navigation doesn't display drop-down menu, it only shows the first-level menu

body_pc_second_font_size.label: Secondary navigation font size on desktop

body_pc_second_font_bold.label: Bold display of secondary navigation on computer

body_pc_thirdly_font_size.label: Font size of tertiary navigation on desktop

mobile_top_menu.label: Pin-to-top menu on mobile
mobile_top_menu.info: This will pin menu to bottom of header on mobile device and can be switched with left-right scroll

mobile_top_menu_show_home.label: Menu pinned to top will only be displayed on home page
mobile_top_menu_show_home.info: This will only display menu pinned to top on the home page

group_header__4.label: Highlights
group_header__4.info: You can highlight specific menu items

highlight_menus.label: Highlights menu
highlight_menus.info: Enter the main menu names you want to highlight. Separate multiple names with a comma (,).

menu_title.label: Trigger menu
menu_title.info: Enter your first-level menu name, which will take effect when you have a dropdown

image.label: Image
image.info: Suggested ratio: 2:1 / Size: 220-220px Suggested ratio: 1:2 / Size: 157-157px

m_show_textarea.label: Display text below the image on mobile

pc_image_position.label: Image position on desktop
pc_image_position.info: Text below image by default on mobile

show_collection_cover.label: Display collection image
show_collection_cover.info: To add collection images, go to the product collection management page. [Add now](/admin/categories)

group_header__0.label: Product information
group_header__0.info: To configure promotion tags and view/add to your cart, go to ['Theme settings' > 'Products'](/editor?locator=settings&category=product)

price_show_type.label: Display style of price
price_show_type.info: If the product has only one variant, then display with the style of single price

image_display_area.label: Image display area
image_display_area.info: Adjust the product map display area

show_secondary_image.label: Display next product image on hover

mobile_show_secondary_image.label: Display the next product image when hovering on a mobile device

group_header__0.label: To use this feature, create a namespace called "highlights" and a key with the name "list" for the product metafield, selecting the data type as "multi-line text". Once created, you can add values for the metafield field in specific products, and they will be displayed on the page.

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: To achieve optimal results, please use an image with 16:9 aspect ratio

show_text_box.label: Display text background module on PC

show_text_below.label: Display contents below image on mobile device

product_info_sticky.label: Fixed display of product info on desktop

product_image_size.label: Content size on desktop
product_image_size.info: Media files will automatically optimize on mobile

image_quality.label: Image compression ratio
image_quality.info: Configure the compression ratio for main and thumbnail images. We recommend selecting a compression ratio of 80% or lower to ensure optimal store performance and user experience.

video_autoplay.label: Video autoplay
video_autoplay.info: Videos cannot autoplay due to browser limitations

hide_variants.label: Hide pictures of other SKUs after selecting a SKU

options__2.label: Promotion tag, selling price, original price

options__3.label: Selling price, original price, promotion tag

save_style.label: Promotion tag style
save_style.info: To edit promotion tag colors, go to ['Theme settings' > 'Colors'](/editor?locator=settings&category=color)

font_size_flexible.label: Flexible font size configuration
font_size_flexible.info: When turned on, you can customize font size

sale_price_pc_font_size.label: Selling price font size on desktop

sale_price_mobile_font_size.label: Selling price font size on mobile

regular_price_pc_font_size.label: Original price (compare-at price) font size on desktop

regular_price_mobile_font_size.label: Original price (compare-at price) font size on mobile

save_price_pc_font_size.label: Promotion tag font size on desktop

save_price_mobile_font_size.label: Promotion tag font size on mobile

enabled_color_swatch.label: Enable color palette
enabled_color_swatch.info: When activated, the color palette will display as Tile view by default. [Learn more](https://help.shopline.com/hc/en-001/articles/18291247740825-Quick-Add-to-Cart-of-Palette-Feature#h_01J0X1YZHS09MJ94XAYHX515ZV)

inventory_threshold.label: Low inventory threshold
inventory_threshold.info: Selecting of 0 means to display "In stock" all the time

group_header__0.label: Add relevant social media links in ['Theme settings' > 'Social media'](/editor?locator=settings&category=media_social)

To use this feature, create a namespace called "highlights" and a key with the name "list" for the product metafield, selecting the data type as "multi-line text". Once created, you can add values for the metafield field in specific products, and they will be displayed on the page.

show_secondary_image.label: Display next product image on hover

address.label: Address

google_api_secret_key.info: Enter the Google Map API to show the map. [How to get the API key?](https://shoplineapphelp.zendesk.com/hc/articles/4411546876313-%E5%A6%82%E4%BD%95%E6%B3%A8%E5%86%8C-Google-Maps-API-%E5%AF%86%E9%92%A5)

external_video.label: External video link
external_video.info: Enter the embedded link from YouTube or Vimeo

image_padding.label: Image fill method
image_padding.info: Images are fixed as 'Fit' in large image layout

image.info: Recommended minimum width of 820 px, height is adjustable

group_header__1.info: If there's no button text, click the image to redirect

show_touch.label: Turn on left-right scroll on mobile

external_video.label: External video link
external_video.info: Enter the embedded link from YouTube or Vimeo

desktop_logo_width.label: Maximum LOGO width on PC
desktop_logo_width.info: This setting is the maximum displayable width, the width will be adjusted according to the actual screen size

mobile_logo_width.label: Maximum LOGO width on mobile device
mobile_logo_width.info: This setting is the maximum displayable width, the width will be adjusted according to the actual screen size

mobile_logo_height.label: Maximum LOGO height on mobile device

color_card_background.label: Card background
color_card_background.info: Used for product, collection, and blog cards

color_card_text.info: Used for product, collection, and blog cards

color_button_secondary_background.label: Secondary button background
color_button_secondary_background.info: Secondary buttons are usually in an outline state, including Add to cart, Quick add to cart, etc.

group_header__0.label: Grid
group_header__0.info: Affects areas with multiple columns or rows

quick_view_button_pc_style.label: Quick Add to cart style on desktop
quick_view_button_pc_style.info: If set as a button style, you can adjust the button position using the Product list > Quick add to cart button block

quick_view_button_mobile_style.label: Quick Add to cart style on mobile
quick_view_button_mobile_style.info: If set as a button style, you can adjust the button position using the Product list > Quick add to cart button block

group_header__1.label: Product card discount tag
group_header__1.info: This only affects the promotion tag. You can set the tag display on the product details page in Product details > Price.

product_discount_style.label: Discount display format
product_discount_style.info: This takes effect when the save tag is selected as the promotion tag.

co_banner_phone_img.label: Image on mobile
co_banner_phone_img.info: Display the image of PC size on mobile device if there aren't any images uploaded for mobiles.

co_color_msg_color.label: Highlighted information
co_color_msg_color.info: Link, checkbox, input box border & drop-down menu

group_header__0.label: Account
group_header__0.info: Guide customers to your social media account

group_header__1.label: Share
group_header__1.info: Turn on sharing on product details page and blog page
